name: Data Hacker: Corruption - a massive Dual-plot RPG
blurb: Corruption is eating into the heart of all worlds. In the coming war, on which side do you stand?

You want to join us on this JOURNEY, but with BOXED copies and other stuff! (Approx $305) ============================== Everything you get with the \u00a3125 reward tier ==============================  A copy of the game's printed Art book, containing artwork, scribbles and screenshots from concept to production ============================== A printed copy of the game's supplementary game guide book ==============================  A Mousepad featuring your choice of artwork ============================== A VIP ticket to a web conference with yours truly, to discuss... anything you want to really! ============================== We will name a character something of your choosing (within reason), give them riches and power within the game and work with you to develop the character's backstory and mini quest! ==============================\r\n (You can add 1CREDIT per additional \u00a31 pledged for the 'addon store!')

You want to become an Executive Data Hacker Producer! ============================== Everything in the \u00a3199 reward tier ============================== In addition to the Art Book and Corruption Game Guide, you'll also get a printed copy of Initiation's Game Guide! ============================== A T-Shirt adorned with artwork of your choosing! ============================== You will be listed in Corruption's credits as an Executive Producer (business or personal names both accepted). We will also include a link to your website, if you so wish ============================== We will erect a statue in the game in your honour, complete with game lore, immortalising you above the 'mere mortals' of the game ==============================   (You can add 1CREDIT per additional \u00a31 pledged for the 'addon store!')

You want a personal, crafted experience! ============================== Everything you see in the \u00a3399 reward tier ============================== The personal experience consists of coming to London, UK for a weekend! I'll pick you up from the airport, if necessary, and head into town to be tourists, see the sights, stuff our faces on great food, supplemented with a few drinks of course! If there are any events on that you'd like to visit, we'll do that! London is your oyster! All expenses paid, including accommodation, food, drinks and Studio 69 merchandise. (Flights not included. To add an extra person to this reward, get in touch!).
